title: Wed 12/9 - UGLY Holiday Sweater and Boy TOY Drive Networking Party
desc: WEDNESDAY 12/9, 6-9pm BOY? TOY  DRIVE  Networking Party Featuring our 2nd Annual   UGLY  HOLIDAY  SWEATER  CONTEST ? A?BIG Gay?Networking Party and?Toy Drive Presented by TheMenEvent.com Townhouse, 236 East 58th Street (bet 2nd and 3rd Aves) Featuring: ????????????????????  *  Bring an Unwrapped Toy!  Toy donations will go to the Kingsbridge Heights Community Center, serving low income families in the Bronx.? * Free Appetizers at  6pm ? * Happy Hour Specials ??? * Hundreds of Attendees?????  *  PLUS  Rock your   UGLY   HOLIDAY   SWEATER   CONTEST  - Wear your ugliest holiday sweater for your chance to win a major prize. Whether your  sweater has reindeer, snowflakes, santas, yule logs, pine trees or snowmen, you know you have an ugly holiday sweater in your closet. Bring it out, don it like it was the gayest apparel and you could win our photo contest. Just come to the?raffle ?table to get your photo taken and your sweater will be entered into a special online contest and YOU could be the winner. Special prizes will also be awarded during the party for ugly holiday sweaters.
